problem_text:
Let k be a field of characteristic 0. According to (Yu. I. Merzlyakov, Proc. Stek- lov Inst. Math., 167 (1986), 263–266), the family Repk(G) of all canonical matrix representations of a k-powered group G over k may be regarded as an affine k-variety. Find an explicit form of equations defining this variety.
Yu. I. Merzlyakov
